## Economic activity in last 10 years (Q314)

```{r}
jur_314 <- data.frame(frq(hhjur$q_314)) %>%
  select(2:4) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  arrange(desc(frq)) %>%
  mutate(percent=round(frq/sum(frq),3),
         rank=rev(rank(frq)))

jur_314_gt <- jur_314 %>%
  select(-1, Income=2) %>%
  gt() 

jur_314_gt
```
